# Interactive component

For our interactive component we created a tool to look at the different sources of CO2 Emissions and Electricity production for various countries from 1971 to 2014.

<iframe src="interactive.html" width="400" height="300"></iframe>


In case the above plot cannot be viewed, please follow the following instructions.

1. Copy the index.html file and data.csv file into one folder. (It can be the git folder)
2. Open a terminal window in that folder
3. Use the following command to launch a simple http server ‘python -m SimpleHTTPServer’ or 'python3 -m http.server'
4. Open the url “http://localhost:8000/interactive.html” in a browser window to access the interactive plot.
